channel.title: RSPS Website Template - Early Alpha
channel.description:
[center] [b]Welcome to my new template's post![/b]
This isn't done yet, this is early alpha, and I plan to make it a big project, it doesn't look much like a rsps template yet, but it's going to. Everything is easily editable. I'm trying to make it compatible for both IE and Chrome/Firefox. I mean everything still works but rounded corners, so yeah :\
Google Chrome/Firefox [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/125l1fr.png[/img]
Internet Explorer [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2pqmlfl.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: RSPS Website Template - Early Alpha
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

pkerzscap3:

Looks good, but wrong section since there is no download, move it to development. ;D

yup

Btw - You did really good on the navigation bar, but then it seems you messed up with the content.

I would continue the grey you were working with, such as making a gradient for the main content box. Plus the black borders kinda would ruin the gradient so I would make that a very soft grey colour, or white as you did on the top border of the navbar (selected). I would basicly say the exact same thing for the green notification box, incept that the green could work, just that the colour is kinda horrid. I would make a gradient with that and lower how the thickness of the border

Other then those few fixed I think that you would have a beut website going…

Read full topic
